title: How to Make Oatmeal Muffins

steps.headline: Melt and cool fat, if needed, otherwise skip this step.
Sift dry ingredients into a large mixing bowl.
Make a well in the dry ingredients.
Add the egg and milk to the well.
Add the cooked oatmeal and molasses.
Grease or line the muffin tins with paper liners.
Spoon the muffin batter into the prepared tin.
Bake 20 minutes or until muffins test done.

text: Melt and cool fat, if needed, otherwise skip this step.  Preheat oven to 400ºF/200ºC.  Sift dry ingredients into a large mixing bowl.  Make a well in the dry ingredients.  Beat the egg.  Add the egg and milk to the well.  Add the fat.  Add the cooked oatmeal and molasses.  Mix gently to combine.  Grease or line the muffin tins with paper liners.  Spoon the muffin batter into the prepared tin.  Bake 20 minutes or until muffins test done.
